actions.text: Submitted for Original Consideration as a Question of the Privileges of the House.

actions.committee: House Committee on Rules by Motion, Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 256 - 161 (Record Vote No: 227)
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules by Motion, Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 256 - 161 (Record Vote No: 227).

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Rules by Motion, Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 256 - 161 (Record Vote No: 227)

official_title: A resolution establishing a select committee to conduct an investigation and inquiry into the alleged alterations of and omissions in the transcripts of hearings held before certain committees and subcommittees of the House of Representatives.

summary.text: Establishes a select committee to investigate the alleged alterations of certain hearing transcripts during the second session of the 97th Congress and whether other House documents have been altered. Requires the select committee to report to the House not later than October 28, 1983.

titles.title: A resolution establishing a select committee to conduct an investigation and inquiry into the alleged alterations of and omissions in the transcripts of hearings held before certain committees and subcommittees of the House of Representatives.
